meanings.sent1: The towkay at the factory oversees all the workers.
meanings.sent2: The towkay hired new employees for the company.
meanings.sent3: The towkay joked with the staff during the meeting.
meanings.sent4: She was the towkay of the household, making all the important decisions.
meanings.sent5: The towkay's presence commanded respect among the employees.

meanings.definition: A wealthy or influential person in a particular industry or community.
meanings.sent1: The towkay of the town owned the biggest store on Main Street.
meanings.sent2: Everyone wanted to be friends with the towkay of the neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The towkay's fancy car always turned heads when driving through town.
meanings.sent4: She was the towkay of the fashion world, setting trends effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The towkay's generosity made a lasting impact on the community.
